Mentas does great work. I ask him if he would like to join this project but did not hear back from him.

With the ribbon control I would like to have a complete control. This would include the large tooltips, ribbon bar collapse on double click, collapse of internal panels relative to width and complete designers. I also think having a complete set of tools in one location will be good for the community. I know there are a lot of controls that could be done and sometimes I think we should be working on a lot of smaller controls rather than a few large controls. I have held off on a lot of smaller controls like mask text boxes that actually work correctly with dates and numbers unlike the current 2.0 .Net. because I have been waiting on MS to release their service pack for 2.0. I keep hoping they will fix some of the current controls shortcomings.

There are also personal reasons for wanting to do the RibbonBar. Basically it is the challenge of the large controls. As a consultant too many of my days are spent doing get the data, show the data, save the data. I need to keep myself challenged all the time to stay happy as a programmer otherwise it is nothing but boredom.

Thanks,
Scorn
